body.name: Solo Stove Bonfire 2.0, Smokeless Fire Pit | Wood Burning Fireplaces with Removable Ash Pan, Portable Outdoor Firepit - Ideal for Camping, Stainless Steel, H: 14 in x Dia: 19.5 in, 20 lbs
features: MOST UNIQUE FIRE PIT: Bonfire pushes the limits of both combustion airflow efficiency and minimalist outdoor design with its all stainless steel construction. It was brilliantly engineered to provide a backyard fire experience that cannot be duplicated. The new 2.0 version features a removable base plate and ash pan for easy cleaning.

LESS SMOKE, MORE FLAME: The camping stove features our Signature 360° Airflow and double wall design with bottom vent holes for oxygen to feed the fire from below, creating a burst of hot air over the fire and reducing the smoke without the use of batteries and fans in your fireplaces. Enjoy a fire without the post-fire smell in your hair and clothes.

LONG LASTING & REMOVABLE ASH PAN: 304 stainless steel is highly durable, surprisingly lightweight, and won’t cave under the pressure of an ultra-hot flame. Our new, removable ash pan rests under the base plate, catching all the fine ash in one place. For clean up just lift the base plate to remove the ash pan and clean out its contents. Quick and easy!

PORTABLE DESIGN: Weighing in at just over 20 pounds, Bonfire is ready to go on the next adventure whenever you are. Just pack up your Bonfire in the included carry case, get moving and spark up a fire everywhere you go– whether you’re camping, partying at the beach, or just redecorating your backyard.

EASY TO USE: Making good moments should always be easy. This outdoor patio heater construction completely removes the need for parts and assembly! Just Flip the ring and light a fire. 14x19.5 inch size wood burning fire pit, fire pits for outside.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Ultimate Fire Pit Solo Stove Bonfire 2.0 The Solo Stove Bonfire is unlike any other fire pit you’ve ever seen! We have used our patented technology that has been perfected into a portable fire pit to take along on trips or to enjoy at home. The best part? Nearly no smoke and only fine ash left over! Making the Bonfire not only easy to clean up, but won’t leave you smelling like campfire. The Bonfire gets its power from logs, & creates a secondary burn and a beautiful flame that your family and friends will enjoy gathering around!

360° Signature Airflow Design How does it work? Cool air comes in the bottom vents to feed the fire and enters between the two layers of stainless steel to be heated up. Having cool air come in the bottom vents allows the fire to always plenty of oxygen. Since more oxygen can reach the fuel source, fire wood is burned more efficiently than traditional fire pits. The air that enters the double wall warms up and is pushed out over the fire. This creates a second burn that burns off the small particles of wood that would have been smoke.

Previous page Enjoy with Friends Use the Bonfire for food or as the perfect ambiance for your party and unforgettable experiences Easy Set Up Ditch the hassle of complicated assembly. Just flip the ring and start your fire! Ultra Portable Spark up adventures everywhere you go– whether you’re camping, at the beach, or in the backyard. Long Lasting 304 stainless steel is highly durable, lightweight, and won’t cave under the pressure of a hot flame Removable Ash Pan Just lift the base plate to remove the ash pan, clean out its contents for super easy cleaning. Next page 1 Enjoy with Friends 2 Easy Set Up 3 Ultra Portable 4 Long Lasting 5 Removable Ash Pan

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very well made
reviews.reviewText: My wife and I love sitting out by the fire so we figured we'd give the Solo stove a shot. It burns much cleaner than a traditional fire pit though not smoke free. It doesn't take much kindling to get it going and it throws a lot of heat. You should be aware that you need smaller firewood for it. It also tends to stop working after about 2 hours when the aeration holes in the bottom fill with ash. Cleaning up is easy since it reduces your wood to very fine ash. Make sure you get a long neck lighter to get it started.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Starts a fire EASILY!!
reviews.reviewText: This is the most amazing product!!! For YEARS my husband and I have tried to have a good bonfire in our firepit. For years it led to frustration and discouragement whenever we tried to get a fire started. We had a fire within minutes with this product and the fire got big. This size is perfect and has a lot more room than I originally thought. My husband can't handle smoke smells and this truly is smokeless!! So happy my husband can enjoy the fore with us now. This is worth every penny. I am so excited our family can have a lovely campfire and experience this together now, with ease!! We had some fire starters and a little plain mulch kindling at the bottom and then put the logs on after the kindling got going a little bit. So effortless!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Why didn't I get this sooner? Worth every pretty penny.
reviews.reviewText: I've always been wanting to get a fire pit for my yard one I've got a bunch of old water damaged wood flooring that came with the house stored in the garage, this woods probably from 1940 since the house was made in 1930. Super easy to light just used some paper and cardboard no starter fluid and some small sticks to get it going once it starts up there's no smoke or hardly any at all. The way that it projects straight up it's almost as if the secondary burn creates a vortex or upwards pressure that keeps the smoke if any up high and out of any faces or people. One of the photos are if the bottom of the removable ash pan it turns a nice burnt titanium like color and some other parts of the stove turn this great color as well. Amazingly painless clean up pull out the pan (where gloves to not get soot on you) dump the ashes responsibly i through them in my shrubs to help them grow. Pull out the actual ash pan dump and then flip the stove upsidedown to get any remaining out. Then put it in the storage bag and store it either in the garage or somewhere else. I did purchase an off brand grill top / stand that works really well for cooking and keeping it off the ground. All in all it should be 6 stars for the memories created the ease of use and just overall very well built product for the price worth every penny!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice looking, but not smokeless
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I still think this is one of the best fire pits on the market. However, you need to constantly have the right amount of heat and wood or it becomes just another nice looking fire pit.One truth we continue to struggle with is how to let the fire die down without being very smokey. Our first couple fires we followed the directions and then let the fire burn out by itself. This causes tremendous smoke that is quite embarrassing after telling neighbors and friends that you have a low smoke fire pit. It smokes more than our prior $30 fire pit because we could at least spread out ambers and it would die quickly, but the solo allows great airflow which allows embers to continue to smolder for an hour or more. Again, not enough heat and not enough (or too much) wood and the solo smokes like anything else.Luckily, there is a serviceable solution, but of course it costs additional money. We went with a commercial 16” pizza pan which really helps. I hear solo’s lid is even better, but is 6x as expensive. So if you buy this, a high temp tolerant lid of some sort is a necessity. 4/5 stars, as a lid should be included so you don’t have a long smokey ending to your “ low smoke” pit fire.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Provides heat, burns wood, looks good. That's all I need. I have a friend who's had his for a couple of years now. That's what inspired the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: High hesitated for a year or so. But then I decided to go for it. I love outdoor fires and my indoor fireplace. So soothing. This did exactly as they described and the videos showed. I bought the deflector as well. Does a great job. Just placed it on three bricks and it works fine. Love to sit in my rocking chair and enjoy The View

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It does divert the smoke through the holes in the top just like it says, making it smokeless. Great to warm up by.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just as advertised
reviews.reviewText: Looks great. No snake and everyone is warm around the fire. You don’t have to get too close to keep warm. Looks great on our patio.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Looks stunning and friends and family love it. It is actually smokeless, gives great heat and easily cleaned. Love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. So glad I purchased this I absolutely love it 🔥
